hooks.name: auto-format-code
hooks.description: Automatically format TypeScript/TSX files after edits
hooks.prompt:
Invoke formatting script via Bash tool:

CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR=${CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR} ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/scripts/format-code.sh "{{TOOL_INPUT_file_path}}"

Script logs all events to ${CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR}/agent-logs/plugin-hook-events.log and handles formatting logic.
